i attend book club every week.
I enjoy working with my team and getting to help people.

content.text: Pretty good! Just got back from the beach, it was a lot of fun.
Oh fun! Where did you go?
I went to the seaside for a walk and read a book. It was really relaxing.
That sounds really nice! I love the beach.
Me too! I try to go as often as I can.
I wish I could go more often, but I'm not very close to the beach.
I know what you mean, I'm lucky to live so close.
Do you have a favorite book?
I have a lot of favorite books, but my all-time favorite is "To Kill a Mockingbird".
Oh I love that book! I read it in high school and I still think about it all the time.
Me too! It's such a powerful story.
What do you like about it so much?
I love the way it explores the themes of racism and justice. It's a really important book.
I agree. It's definitely one of those books that everyone should read.
